dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Identification of the system from which the data are received.
Type and characteristics of the data as transmitted by a system.

dataItemFormat.description: Variable length Data Item comprising a first part of one-octet, followed by one-octet extents as necessary.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Warning/error conditions detected by a system for the target report involved.

dataItemFormat.description: Variable length Data Item comprising a first part of one-octet, followed by one-octet extents as necessary.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Position of a target in WGS-84 Coordinates.

bits.bitsNameLong: Latitude in WGS-84 in twos complement.
Longitude in WGS-84 in twos complement.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Calculated position in Cartesian Coordinates, in two’s complement representation.
Mode-2 code converted into octal representation.
Mode-1 code converted into octal representation.
Mode-3/A code converted into octal representation.
Flight Level (Mode S Altitude) converted into binary two's complement representation.
Mode-C height in Gray notation as received from the transponder together with the confidence level for each reply bit as provided by a MSSR/Mode-S station.
Vertical distance between the target and the projection of its position on the earth’s ellipsoid, as defined by WGS84, in two’s complement form.

Height above local 2D co-ordinate system in reference to the MLT System Reference Point as defined in item I019/610, in two’s complement form, based on a direct measurement not related to barometric pressure.
Absolute time stamping expressed as UTC.
An integer value representing a unique reference to a track record within a particular track file.
Status of track.

dataItemFormat.description: Variable length Data Item comprising a first part of one-octet, followed by one-octet extents as necessary.

dataItems.dataItemName: Calculated Track Velocity in Cartesian Coordinates
dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Calculated track velocity expressed in Cartesian Coordinates, in two’s complement representation.
Calculated Acceleration of the target, in two’s complement form.
Target address (ICAO 24-bit address) assigned uniquely to each Target.
Communications capability of the transponder, capability of the on-board ACAS equipment and flight status.

bitValues.text: No alert, SPI, aircraft airborne or on ground

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Target (aircraft or vehicle) identification in 8 characters.

bits.bitsNameLong: Characters 1-8 (coded on 6 bits each) defining target identification

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Mode S Comm B data as extracted from the aircraft transponder.

dataItemFormat.description: Repetitive Data Item starting with a one-octet Field Repetition Indicator (REP) followed by at least one BDS report comprising one seven octet BDS register and one octet BDS code.

bits.bitsNameLong: (MB Data) 56-bit message conveying Mode S Comm B message data
Comm B Data Buffer Store 1 Address
Comm B Data Buffer Store 2 Address

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Currently active Resolution Advisory (RA), if any, generated by the ACAS associated with the transponder transmitting the report and threat identity data.

bits.bitsNameLong: (MB Data) 56-bit message conveying Mode S Comm B message data of BDS Register 3,0.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Vehicle fleet identification number.

dataItemFormat.description: One octet fixed length Data Item.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Number related to a pre-programmed message that can be transmitted by a vehicle.

dataItemFormat.description: One octet fixed length Data Item.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Overview of Receiver Units, which have contributed to the Target Detection

dataItemFormat.description: Repetitive Data Item starting with a one-octet Field Repetition Indicator (REP) followed by at least one Contributing Receiver Units list comprising one octet

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Standard Deviation of Position

dataItemFormat.description: Compound Data Item, comprising a primary subfield of one octet, followed by one or more defined subfields.

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: Reserved Expansion Field of ASTERIX Cat 020 (Multilateration Target Reports)

dataItemFormat.description: One byte length field, followed by a one byte items indicator and the encoded items.

bits.bitsNameLong: DOP Covariance Component in two’s complement form
Standard Deviation of Position of the target expressed in Cartesian coordinates (X component)
Standard Deviation of Position of the target expressed in Cartesian coordinates (Y component)
XY Covariance Component in two’s complement form
Standard Deviation of Geometric Height of the target expressed in WGS-84
Standard Deviation of Position of the target expressed in WGS-84 (Latitude component)
Standard Deviation of Position of the target expressed in WGS-84 (Longitude component)
Lat/Long Covariance Component in two’s complement form
Comm B Data Buffer Store 1 Address
Comm B Data Buffer Store 2 Address
Age of the information in the BDS report indicated in bits 16/9
Track Angle clockwise reference to “True North”
Standard deviation of the Ground Speed
Standard deviation of the Track Angle

dataItems.dataItemDefinition: SP
